meanings.definition: A type of lipid found in the blood and body tissues.
meanings.sent1: High levels of cholesterols can increase the risk of heart disease.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often check for cholesterols during routine blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The cholesterols in my body decided to throw a party in my bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: The cholesterols danced through my veins like tiny, fat molecules at a carnival.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the cholesterols as little greasy blobs clogging up the arteries.

meanings.definition: Fatty substances produced by the liver and obtained from food.
meanings.sent1: Some foods contain high amounts of unhealthy cholesterols.
meanings.sent2: The liver plays a crucial role in producing cholesterols for the body.
meanings.sent3: My cholesterols decided to go on strike and refused to be processed by the liver.
meanings.sent4: The cholesterols in my body were like stubborn guests overstaying their welcome.
meanings.sent5: I pictured the cholesterols as little factory workers in my liver, diligently making fat.
